name: supernavigator
description: Unified OS + Application Layer for Claude Code Development - Best of Navigator & Superpowers
longDescription: SuperNavigator combines Navigator's context engineering (92% token reduction) with Superpowers' TDD workflows into a layered architecture. OS Layer provides session management, Theory of Mind, and Loop Mode. App Layer delivers brainstorming, systematic debugging, code review, and parallel development. Both layers communicate via shared .agent/ data store with implicit integration. Local-first with plugin-ready structure.
author: SuperNavigator Contributors

changes: 31 total skills (17 OS layer + 14 App layer)
Shared .agent/ data store for cross-layer communication
breaking: New layered directory structure (skills/os-layer/ and skills/app-layer/)
